Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Et oyeblikk! One second, I am calculating something...

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Okay, all done. Hello, who are you?

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Ah, I'm the new mechanic. I took over for-

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Ah, yes, yes, I have heard of you. Welcome!

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]I am Professor Sove.  This lab is my home away from home, but it is wrecked!

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]*sigh* I suppose you are right, M.O.M.

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Can you put my lab to rights? The experiments were all upset by the power fluctuations.

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Tusen takk!!! I would do it myself, but I am busy calculating the terraforming parameters for our landing on Antioch IV.

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]My lab assistant has left notes on each table, so you should have some idea what to do.

Name: [color=purple]Prof. Sove
Text: [color=black]Thanks! Now then, if lambda is the square root of z...

Name: [color=black]Player
Text: [color=black]Haha! Suppose so. Let's get to work!
